eID Applet SQL DDL Plugin

eid-applet-sql-ddl:generate-sql-ddl

Full name:

be.fedict.eid-applet:eid-applet-sql-ddl-plugin:1.2.0-SNAPSHOT:generate-sql-ddl

Description:

Maven2 plugin to generate SQL DDL scripts out of JPA entities.

Test via: mvn be.fedict.eid-applet:eid-applet-sql-ddl-plugin:1.0.2-SNAPSHOT:generate-sql-ddl

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
artifactItems ArrayList - (no description)
hibernateDialect String - Name of the Hibernate dialect to be used for SQL DDL script generation.
outputDirectory File - Directory containing the generated docbook XML.
outputName String - Name of the generated SQL DDL script.

Parameter Details

artifactItems:

(no description)
  • Type: java.util.ArrayList
  • Required: Yes

hibernateDialect:

Name of the Hibernate dialect to be used for SQL DDL script generation.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes

outputDirectory:

Directory containing the generated docbook XML.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${project.build.directory}

outputName:

Name of the generated SQL DDL script.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
